with final_table as (
  select
      a.date
      , a.listeners
      , replace(replace(substring(a.episode_name, 2, 128), '%20', ' '), '.csv', '') as episode_name
  from Temp_Raw_ACastProgrammaticListenersPerEpisode a
)
-- select * from final_table
MERGE INTO Raw_ACastProgrammaticListenersPerEpisode a
USING final_table b
    ON a.date = b.date 
    and a.episode_name = b.episode_name
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET 
        a.listeners  = b.listeners 
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (date, listeners, episode_name)
  VALUES (
        b.date
        , b.listeners
        , b.episode_name 
        );

with final_table as (
    select
        'Podcast/Vodcast' as channel
        ,'Acast' as sub_channel
        , 'Programmatic' as content
    		, cast(date as datetime) as date
        , datename(month, date) as month
        , concat(datename(month, date), ' ', year(date)) as month_year
        , concat(datename(month, date), ' ', year(date), ' Week ', (DATEPART(week, date) - DATEPART(week, DATEADD(day, 1, EOMONTH(date, -1)))) + 1) as week
        , datename(dw, date) as day_week
        , case when datename(dw, date) in ('Saturday', 'Sunday') then 'Weekend' else 'Weekday' end as week_type
        , 'Unspecified' as time_day
        , listeners as impression_by_date
        , listeners as users_by_date
        , episode_name as activity_calendar_events    --using listerners here until more clarity
        , date as event_occurence_by_date    --using listerners here until more clarity 
        , date as event_occurence_by_time    --using listerners here until more clarity
        , 'Russell Gower' as activity_implemented_by
    from Raw_ACastProgrammaticListenersPerEpisode
    where date is not null
)

MERGE INTO Changemakers_Combined_Overview a
USING final_table b
    on a.channel = b.channel
    and a.sub_channel = b.sub_channel
    and a.date = b.date
    and a.activity_calendar_events = b.activity_calendar_events 
WHEN MATCHED THEN
  UPDATE SET 
        a.impression_by_date = b.impression_by_date
        , a.users_by_date = b.users_by_date
        , a.activity_calendar_events = b.activity_calendar_events
        , a.event_occurence_by_date = b.event_occurence_by_date
        , a.event_occurence_by_time = b.event_occurence_by_time
        , a.activity_implemented_by = b.activity_implemented_by
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
  INSERT (channel, sub_channel, content, date, month, month_year, week, day_week, week_type, time_day, impression_by_date, users_by_date, activity_calendar_events, event_occurence_by_date, event_occurence_by_time, activity_implemented_by)
  VALUES (
        b.channel
        , b.sub_channel
        , b.content
        , b.date 
        , b.month
        , b.month_year
        , b.week
        , b.day_week
        , b.week_type
        , b.time_day
        , b.impression_by_date
        , b.users_by_date
        , b.activity_calendar_events
        , b.event_occurence_by_date
        , b.event_occurence_by_time
        , b.activity_implemented_by
        );
